name: Dungeon Heist (Obi-Gun Kenobi)
description:
This is my game I made for the MizJam1 and it is also my first game jam! If you have any feedback I'd love to hear about it! (it's very short)

btw I know I need to learn how to do good UI (menus and stuff like that)

Also I used this to make the sprites voxelized by cenullum

and the asset pack is from kenny.nl as people doing the MizJam1 would know.

Lastly this game was made in the Godot Engine 3.2.2

Other than that I hope you enjoy my game :D

P.S. I have exported for linux users but don't know if it will work because I am on windows 10, so if your on linux and try the linux version could you tell me if it works or not. Also the same for mac. Thanks :)
